description: Stunning 3 Bed + Flex Room | 2.5 Bath | 1,553 Sq Ft — Welcome home to the prestigious and highly sought-after Harvest at Bose Farms, where thoughtful design meets modern living. This beautifully crafted home offers open-concept living on the main floor with a spacious chef’s kitchen featuring a waterfall quartz island, 5-burner gas cooktop, premium stainless steel KitchenAid appliances, and ample storage, complemented by large north-facing windows, 9-foot ceilings, crown molding, and a striking feature wall with an electric fireplace in the living area. Upstairs boasts three generously sized bedrooms with high ceilings, including a luxurious primary suite with a spa-inspired ensuite and double vanity. The lower level includes a versatile flex room ideal for an office OR den
